1.name: Objection!
1.note: 45% chance to Stun the opponent for 3 seconds.

2.name: Found in Contempt
2.note: 55% chance to Stun the opponent for 4 seconds.

3.name: Clear the Courtroom
3.note: 65% chance to Stun the opponent for 4.25 seconds.

attack.heavy: She-Hulk attempts to knock some sense into Stunned champions, striking with 146% increased Attack and removing the Stun effect.
attack.description:
She-Hulk’s extensive weight training allows her Special Attacks up to 18% increased chance to Stun based on how large the opposing champion is.
 The full 18% chance to Stun is against giant champions such as Juggernaut and Hulk-Buster, while small champions will see a much smaller Stun increase chance.
attack.note: This Stun increase chance is a flat increase on the base. Meaning a Special 3 against a giant champion will be 83% chance (65% + 18%)

gameplay.description: She-Hulk has some of the longest Stun durations in the game, and amplifying her Stun effects can allow her to destroy her opponent’s when used correctly.

signature.description:
The effects are as follows for the various classes:
Science = Physical Resistance 
Mystic = Power Gain Rate 
Cosmic = Buff Duration 
Tech = Ability Accuracy 
Mutant = Special Damage 
Skill = Critical Hit Damage
signature.name: Citing Precedent
signature.note: This effect is a Passive effect and does not interact with effects such as Nullify, Purge or Willpower.
